attributes.action: Abolish Council Tax for the whole duration of the pandemic period + 6 months
attributes.additional_details: As all businesses are not going to receive any charges for business rates, this must be reflected to all households especially the ones where income has been affected. Many people are self employed or small LTD’s that don’t meet the government’s criteria’s for any grants and loan offers don’t look attractive as the future is unsure and more debt will add more pressure to any small business or self employed person.
attributes.background: Abolish Council Tax for the whole duration of the pandemic period and an additional 6 months, allowing the economy to recover.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
